isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Auxiliary Radio Controls W/PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Auxiliary Radio Controls W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: The radio station is changed in the up direction when the seek switch is closed and current flows through circuit 86H, seek switch, and circuit 86K. The radio band is changed when the band switch is closed and current flows through circuit 86L, the band switch, and circuit 86M.
